name: Wick: The Hot Foot
description:
A Mario fan-game based in some part of Yoshi's Island.

You play as a living flame--Wick, a "Hot Foot" (an enemy from Super Mario Bros. 3)--that was birthed from flowing magma in this platforming adventure to save your ancestor's altars from the evil Rainmaker, Cloudjihn.

Made for MFGG's Game Jam about Too Much Water !

Control Instructions are built into the game-play.

NOTE: This does create an external save file, in the directory of the game. Go ahead and change that value, I don't care. (For real though, "The Games Factory 1" is outdated and is known to crash, so modify the value to skip to the next level if it does end up crashing)
